code: import React from'react';import'../styles/StatCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,change,changeType,icon,color='primary',description}=_ref;const getChangeIcon=()=>{if(!change)return null;return changeType==='increase'?'↗️':'↘️';};const getChangeClass=()=>{if(!change)return'';return changeType==='increase'?'positive':'negative';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card ".concat(color),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-icon",children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"stat-title",children:title}),description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"stat-description",children:description})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-value",children:value}),change!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-change ".concat(getChangeClass()),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"change-icon",children:getChangeIcon()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"change-value",children:[Math.abs(change),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"change-label",children:"from previous period"})]})]});};export default StatCard;
